summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated March 10, 2011. The email contains a brief message indicating that the information is confidential and may be attorney-client privileged, suggesting a legal context. The email emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of its contents.
